nodes.text: Jugsmuk Fair was one of the largest fairs that occurred on the planet Gamorr during slushtime. Due to the presence of Jugsmuk Station, one of the only true spaceports on the world, the fair attracted both off-world attention and merchants from all over the Wugguh continent. Jugsmuk Fair hosted a large fighting tournament for boars, but it was principally a training fair. Young tuskers would issue their first challenges, while older tuskers would hone their skills and be watchful of the competition.
